data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Král, David, Hillert, Oliver, Drožová, Dana, Šípek, Petr (2018): Lethrus (Lethrus) thracicus (Coleoptera: Geotrupidae), a new species from the European part of Turkey. Zootaxa 4521 (4): 573-583, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4521.4.6|9 occurrences
